messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: ([A-Za-z ]+,\s*)*[A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine a flower county with 16 flower fields. The rose field is connected to the sunflower field, tulip field, daisy field, and lily field. The sunflower field is connected to the rose field, tulip field, daisy field, and aster fields. The tulip field is connected to the rose field, sunflower field, daisy field and orchid field. The daisy field is also connected to the rose field, sunflower field, tulip field, and zinnia field. The orchid field is connected to the hydrangea field, lily field, daffodil field, and tulip field. The hydrangea field is connected to the orchid field, lily field, peony field, and marigold field. The lily field is connected to rose field, peony field, hydrangea field, and orchid field. The peony field is also connected to the orchid field, hydrangea field, lily field, and chrysanthemum field. The daffodil field is connected to the chrysanthemum field, carnation field, marigold field, and lavender field. The chrysanthemum field is connected to the daffodil field, carnation field, peony field, and marigold field. The carnation field is connected to the poppy field, daffodil field, marigold field, and chrysanthemum field. The marigold field is also connected to the daffodil field, chrysanthemum field, carnation field, and hydrangea field. The poppy field is connected to the zinnia field, lavender field, aster field, and carnation field. The zinnia field is connected to the daisy field, poppy field, lavender field, and aster field. The lavender field is connected to poppy field, zinnia field, aster field, and daffodil field. The aster field is also connected to the poppy field, zinnia field, lavender field, and sunflower field. From the lily field what is the shortest path to the daffodil field? Starting from lily, please list the flower names in order, including lily, separated by commas.

To find the shortest path from the lily field to the daffodil field, we can use the breadth-first search algorithm. We will keep track of the visited flower fields and their connections.

1. Start at the lily field.
2. Check the connections of the lily field.
3. The lily field is connected to the rose field, peony field, hydrangea field, and orchid field. Mark these fields as visited.
4. From the connections of the lily field, check their connections.
5. The rose field is connected to the sunflower field, tulip field, daisy field, and lily field. Mark the sunflower field, tulip field, daisy field, and lily field as visited.
6. The peony field is connected to the orchid field, hydrangea field, lily field, and chrysanthemum field. Mark the orchid field, hydrangea field, lily field, and chrysanthemum field as visited.
7. The hydrangea field is connected to the orchid field, lily field, peony field, and marigold field. Mark the orchid field, lily field, peony field, and marigold field as visited.
8. The orchid field is already visited, so we skip it.
9. From the connections of the lily field, check their connections.
10. The sunflower field is connected to the rose field, tulip field, daisy field, and aster field. Mark the rose field, tulip field, daisy field, and aster field as visited.
11. The tulip field is connected to the rose field, sunflower field, daisy field, and orchid field. The rose field and daisy field are already visited, so we skip them. Mark the sunflower field and orchid field as visited.
12. The daisy field is already visited, so we skip it.
13. From the connections of the lily field, check their connections.
14. The aster field is connected to the poppy field, zinnia field, lavender field, and sunflower field. Mark the poppy field, zinnia field, lavender field, and sunflower field as visited.
15. The sunflower field and lavender field are already visited, so we skip them. Mark the poppy field and zinnia field as visited.
16. From the connections of the lily field, check their connections.
17. The poppy field is connected to the zinnia field, lavender field, aster field, and carnation field. The zinnia field and lavender field are already visited, so we skip them. Mark the aster field and carnation field as visited.
18. From the connections of the lily field, check their connections.
19. The carnation field is connected to the poppy field, daffodil field, marigold field, and chrysanthemum field. The poppy field is already visited, so we skip it. Mark the daffodil field, marigold field, and chrysanthemum field as visited.

Now that we have visited the daffodil field, we can trace back the path from the lily field to the daffodil field:

Lily -> Peony -> Chrysanthemum -> Daffodil

Answer: Lily, Peony, Chrysanthemum, Daffodil
